items.title: Start Date of Winter School Holidays Announced in Uzbekistan
items.summary: In the 2025–2026 academic year, winter holidays in general education schools in Uzbekistan will last 14 days.
items.full_content: In the 2025–2026 academic year, winter holidays in general education schools in Uzbekistan will last 14 days.

items.title: President Reviews New Eco-Friendly Buses in Gulistan
items.summary: President of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev reviewed a new fleet of modern buses delivered to Gulistan as part of the city’s urban transport renewal program.
items.full_content: President of Uzbekistan Shavkat Mirziyoyev reviewed a new fleet of modern buses delivered to Gulistan as part of the city’s urban transport renewal program.

items.title: Construction Begins on Uzbek-Russian Agro-Logistics Center in Kuva
items.summary: Construction has begun on an agro-logistics complex worth US$50 million in the Kuva district of Ferghana Region as part of the Uzbek-Russian joint venture LLC “Energy-land,” the press service of the F...
items.full_content: Construction has begun on an agro-logistics complex worth US$50 million in the Kuva district of Ferghana Region as part of the Uzbek-Russian joint venture LLC “Energy-land,” the press service of the Ferghana regional administration reported.

items.title: Uzbekistan and Japan Discuss Expansion of Strategic Partnership
items.summary: On 4 December 2025, Uzbekistan’s Deputy Foreign Minister B. Usmanov met with Japan’s Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary, Kenji Hirata.
items.full_content: On 4 December 2025, Uzbekistan’s Deputy Foreign Minister B. Usmanov met with Japan’s Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary, Kenji Hirata.

items.title: UNG Implements International Stage-Gate Project Management Model
items.summary: JSC “Uzbekneftegaz,” with the support of the international company SASOL, is beginning the implementation of the Stage-Gate methodology to enhance the efficiency of investment project management.
items.full_content: JSC “Uzbekneftegaz,” with the support of the international company SASOL, is beginning the implementation of the Stage-Gate methodology to enhance the efficiency of investment project management.

items.title: Illegal Gold Smuggling from Kyrgyzstan Stopped in Namangan Region
items.summary: Officers from the Border Troops, the Department of State Security Service for Namangan Region, and law enforcement agencies have prevented an attempt to illegally import gold from Kyrgyzstan into Uzbe...
items.full_content: Officers from the Border Troops, the Department of State Security Service for Namangan Region, and law enforcement agencies have prevented an attempt to illegally import gold from Kyrgyzstan into Uzbekistan.

items.title: A Session on the Termez Dialogue on Connectivity between Central and South Asia to be Held at the Doha Forum
items.summary: On 7 December 2025, within the framework of the annual Doha Forum, a dedicated session will be held on the Termez Dialogue on connectivity between Central and South Asia under the theme: “Reviving Afg...
items.full_content: On 7 December 2025, within the framework of the annual Doha Forum, a dedicated session will be held on the Termez Dialogue on connectivity between Central and South Asia under the theme: “Reviving Afghanistan through Regional Connectivity: The Termez Dialogue.”

items.title: “Natsproektstroy” Shows Interest in Tashkent–Samarkand High-Speed Railway Project
items.summary: The Russian company “Natsproektstroy” has expressed interest in the construction of the Tashkent–Samarkand high-speed railway, Alexey Krapivin, CEO of the group of companies, stated in an interview wi...
items.full_content: The Russian company “Natsproektstroy” has expressed interest in the construction of the Tashkent–Samarkand high-speed railway, Alexey Krapivin, CEO of the group of companies, stated in an interview with Uzbekiston 24 TV channel.

items.title: Russia to Play Two Futsal Matches Against Uzbekistan in Bukhara
items.summary: The Russian national futsal team will play two friendly matches against Uzbekistan. The games are scheduled for December 19 and 21 at the Sports Complex of Bukhara State University, with kick-off at 1...
items.full_content: The Russian national futsal team will play two friendly matches against Uzbekistan. The games are scheduled for December 19 and 21 at the Sports Complex of Bukhara State University, with kick-off at 17:00 local time.

items.title: Oracle PL/SQL nima va unga bozorda talab yuqorimi?
items.summary: Uzum’da Oracle PL/SQL team lead’i Sardorbek Xo‘jayev Spot’ga ma’lumot bazalari bilan ishlash, jamoa yetakchilari duch keladigan muammolar va ularning yechimlari haqida so‘zlab berdi.

items.title: Uzbekistan Opens Office for Joint Project with Azerbaijan: Ustyurt Operating Company
items.summary: Today, the office of Ustyurt Operating Company officially began operations. The company was established as part of a cooperative initiative between Uzbekistan and Azerbaijan.

items.title: Центр по организации дорожного движения сократит пробки в Ташкенте на 30−40% — хоким
items.summary: Центр разработает мастер-план столичных дорог с учетом всех видов транспорта. Выбросы автомобилей при этом снизятся до 15%.
items.full_content: Центр разработает мастер-план столичных дорог с учетом всех видов транспорта. Выбросы автомобилей при этом снизятся до 15%.
